scripts.build: bun run build:clean && bun run build:ts && bun run build:copy
scripts.build:copy: cp index.html dist/ && cp src/styles.css dist/ && cp -r node_modules dist/ && sed -i.bak 's|/src/styles.css|./styles.css|g; s|/node_modules/|./node_modules/|g; s|/src/main.ts|./main.js|g' dist/index.html && rm -f dist/index.html.bak
scripts.deploy: bun run build && echo 'Ready for deployment to GitHub Pages'
